ygData.subject: How to deal with URLs that will be automatically changed to another one?
ygData.msgSnippet: For example:http://www.stanford.edu/~cheriton will be changed to http://www.stanford.edu/~cheriton/, and heritrix will return a 301 . How to get a 200 ?
